# pihole_config_files (Resource)

Manages Pi-hole file paths configuration (read-only for most paths).

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Manage file paths (read-mostly, changed only in special cases)
resource "pihole_config_files" "settings" {
  pid          = "/run/pihole-FTL.pid"
  database     = "/etc/pihole/pihole-FTL.db"
  gravity      = "/etc/pihole/gravity.db"
  gravity_tmp  = "/tmp"
  mac_vendor   = "/macvendor.db"
  log_ftl      = "/var/log/pihole/FTL.log"
  log_dnsmasq  = "/var/log/pihole/pihole.log"
  log_webserver = "/var/log/pihole/webserver.log"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `database` (String) Database file path.
- `gravity` (String) Gravity database path.
- `gravity_tmp` (String) Gravity temp directory.
- `log_dnsmasq` (String) dnsmasq log file path.
- `log_ftl` (String) FTL log file path.
- `log_webserver` (String) Webserver log file path.
- `mac_vendor` (String) MAC vendor database path.
- `pid` (String) PID file path.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
